original_title: Liquor shops to remain open tomorrow despite public holiday
original_body_lines: The Department of Excise says that all wine stores and liquor sales outlets across the island will remain open tomorrow (April 07), although it is a public holiday due to Good Friday.
Meanwhile, the Excise Department also mentioned that the wine stores and liquor sales outlets across the country will only be closed on April 13 and 14 in view of the Sinhala and Tamil New Year.
